solution_line_template: The cost of the toy cars is {num_toy_cars} * ${toy_car_cost} = $<<{num_toy_cars}*{toy_car_cost}={toy_cars_total}>>{toy_cars_total}.
The total cost of the toys is ${toy_cars_total} + ${race_track_cost} = $<<{toy_cars_total}+{race_track_cost}={total_toys_cost}>>{total_toys_cost}.
